ARABIC: ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَلِّغُونَ رِسَٰلَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَخْشَوْنَهُۥ وَلَا يَخْشَوْنَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ حَسِيبًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who conveyed Allah's Message and had taqwa of Him, fearing no one except Allah. Allah suffices as a Reckoner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (For) those who convey the messages of God, and fear Him and no one else, God is sufficient to keep account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (This is Allah's Way) regarding those who deliver the Messages of Allah and who fear Him, and fear no one else than Allah. Allah is Sufficient as a Reckoner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who preach the message of God and are humble before Him should not be afraid of anyone besides God. God is Sufficient in keeping the account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who deliver the messages of Allah and fear Him, and do not fear anyone except Allah; and Allah is Sufficient to take account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who convey the Message of Allah and fear Him, and fear none save Allah. And sufficient is Allah as a Reckoner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those who deliver the messages of Allah and fear Him, and do not fear any one but Allah; and Allah is sufficient to take account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who were delivering the Messages of God, and were fearing Him, and fearing not any one except Him; and God suffices as a reckoner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who delivered the messages of Allah and feared Him, and feared none save Allah. Allah keepeth good account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those who conveyed God's messages and fear Him only: God suffices as a reckoner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those who preached the messages of Allah and feared Him, and feared none save Allah; and Allah sufficeth as a Reckoner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: such as deliver the messages of Allah and fear Him, and fear no one except Allah, and Allah suffices as reckoner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (It is the practice of those) who preach the Messages of Allah, and fear Him, and fear none but Allah. And enough is Allah to call (men) to account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those who convey the Message of Allah and fear Him, and fear none save Allah. And Sufficient is Allah as a Reckoner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who were delivering the Messages of Allah, fearing Him and fearing none except Allah. Allah suffices as a Reckoner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who deliver the messages of God, and fear Him, and never fear anyone except God. God is sufficient as a reckoner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah praises] those who convey the messages of Allah and fear Him and do not fear anyone but Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Accountant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:39] — [those] who (alladhīna qualifies the previous alladhīna) deliver the Messages of God and fear Him, and fear no one except Him, and therefore they do not fear what people [might] say about that which God has made lawful for them. And God suffices as Reckoner, as keeper of the deeds of His creatures and [as One] to reckon with them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who delivered the messages of Allah) i.e. David, Solomon and Muhammad (and feared Him) they fear Allah upon conveying the message, (and feared none save Allah. Allah keepeth good account) Allah is Witness.
